name: TKSmartCardToken
desc: A representation of a smart card based cryptographic token.

items.name: init(smartCard: TKSmartCard, aid: Data?, instanceID: String, tokenDriver: TKSmartCardTokenDriver)
items.desc: Initializes a smart card token with the specified smart card, application identifier, and token driver.

items.name: var aid: Data?
items.desc: The ISO 7816-4 application identifiers of the Smart Card.

items.name: class TKSmartCard
items.desc: A representation of a smart card.

items.name: class TKTLVRecord
items.desc: The base class encapsulating a Tag-Length-Value record.

items.name: class TKBERTLVRecord
items.desc: An object that parses BER-encoded data and produces DER-encoded data for TLV records.

items.name: class TKCompactTLVRecord
items.desc: An object that implements encoding using Compact-TLV encoding according to ISO 7816-4.

items.name: class TKSimpleTLVRecord
items.desc: An object that implements encoding using Simple-TLV encoding according to ISO 7816-4.
